## Linear Regression
```{r}
## Counts Model
count.2 = glm(total_refusals ~ USDA01 + USDA_transition01 + import_volume_1M + USDAxVolume1M +  factor(month) + factor(country),
             family = poisson,
             data= monthly)
summary(count.2)


save(count.2, file="output/analysis/ve_analysis_2b_count.RData")
```
